item.title: 分发饼干
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 分发饼干 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/assign-cookies/ class Solution: def findContentChildren(g, s) -> int: g = sorted(g) s = sorted(s) n = 0 for i in range(len(s)): if g[n] <= s[i]: n += 1 if n == len(g): return n return n 贪心算法的题目，考虑局部最优
